glsa.title: PolarSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in PolarSSL, the worst of which might allow a remote attacker to cause a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: PolarSSL is a cryptographic library for embedded systems.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in PolarSSL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker might be able to cause Denial of Service, conduct a man-in-the middle attack, compromise an encrypted communication channel, or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All PolarSSL users should upgrade to the latest version:
